name: treescore-calculator
description: TreeAI Operations Agent for TreeScore point calculations, tree measurements, and AFISS assessments. Handles both standard tree removal and stump grinding point calculations for accurate job estimation and pricing.
capabilities: TreeScore point calculations using Height × (Canopy Radius × 2) × (DBH/12) + AFISS
Stump TreeScore calculations using ((Height above grade + depth of grind) × diameter) + AFISS
AFISS (Access, Fall zone, Interference, Severity, Site) assessment scoring
Point calculation verification and quality control
Bulk point calculations for multi-tree projects
Historical point data analysis and trending

use_cases: On-site tree assessment and point calculation
Work order creation and crew assignment

components.dbh: Diameter at breast height in inches
components.afiss: Access, Fall zone, Interference, Severity, Site complexity score

stump_grinding.formula: ((Height above grade + depth of grind) × diameter) + AFISS

access.description: Equipment and crew access to work area

scoring.6-10: Minor interference, easy to work around

site_conditions.description: Ground conditions, weather, and environmental factors

convex_backend.point_storage: Store calculated points with job details
convex_backend.historical_data: Track point accuracy and job outcomes
convex_backend.bulk_operations: Calculate points for entire project lists

mobile_apps.ios_integration: Native TreeScore calculator with camera integration

business_workflow.lead_assessment: Calculate points during initial site visit
business_workflow.proposal_generation: Use points for time and cost estimation
business_workflow.crew_assignment: Match point complexity to crew capabilities
business_workflow.performance_tracking: Track actual vs estimated point completion

calculation_metrics: Average points per tree by species

useCases: Daily TreeScore calculations for job estimates
Real-time point tracking during job execution
AFISS complexity assessment for crew planning
Historical point analysis for business optimization
Mobile field calculations with photo documentation
Bulk point calculations for large project proposals
